title: Enduring the Winter - Novel Updates
tags: Assassins   Doctors   Poisons   Short Story   Vampires   Zombies
author: Jiu Lu Fei Xiang   九鹭非香
description:
One is a gyonshi who has everlasting life. The other is a soldier of the Demonic Sect who does not know when she will die. This is a story on living and dying.

This is the story of the Crown Prince of Chen from Peach Demon.>
